title: Listen to a city
creator_credit: Eric Fullilove, Andrew J. Helgeson and Cinesound
brief_description: A sophisticated view of Melbourne taking in its gardens, shops, theatres, restaurants, nightclubs and discotheques. Sporting activities include a race meeting, a football match, and water sports. Highlights Melbourne’s annual Moombe Festival and includes scenes at Montsalvat.
creator_credit_for_label: Eric Fullilove, Andrew J. Helgeson and Cinesound
